vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Benjamin living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.8.9;
son of: Shaharaim (H7842) and Hodesh (H2321);
brother of: Jobab (H3103J), Zibia (H6644), Mesha (H4331), Jeuz (H3263), Sachia (H7634), Mirmah (H4821), Abitub (H0036) and Elpaal (H0508)
§ Milcom = "great king"
a Benjamite, son of Shaharaim by his wife Hodesh
vocabinfos._es_Definition: hijo de Saharaim; tribu de Benjamín
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
米勒公,瑪勒堪 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "偉大的王"
1) 亞捫人的神
2) 便雅憫人沙哈連和其妻賀得所生的兒子 (瑪拉干 #代上 8:9)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
米勒公,玛勒堪 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "伟大的王"
1) 亚扪人的神
2) 便雅悯人沙哈连和其妻贺得所生的儿子 (玛拉干 #代上 8:9)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
Another name of mo.lekh (מֹ֫לֶךְ "Molech" H4432)
§ Milcom = "great king"
This name is used for:
1) the god of the Ammonites and Phoenicians to whom some Israelites sacrificed their infants in the valley of Hinnom
1a) also 'Molech'
vocabinfos._es_Definition: deidad cananita, a quien le eran sacrificados niños pequeños
